mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log_info (id, `module`, `type`, message, req_param, res_param, take_up_time, user_id, user_name, `method`, uri, ip, version, create_time) VALUES (#{sysLog.id}, #{sysLog.module}, #{sysLog.type}, #{sysLog.message}, #{sysLog.reqParam}, #{sysLog.resParam}, #{sysLog.takeUpTime}, #{sysLog.userId}, #{sysLog.userName}, #{sysLog.method}, #{sysLog.uri}, #{sysLog.ip}, #{sysLog.version}, #{sysLog.createTime})

INSERT INTO log_error_info (id, req_param, `name`, message, user_id, user_name, `method`, uri, ip, version, create_time) VALUES (#{sysLog.id}, #{sysLog.reqParam}, #{sysLog.name}, #{sysLog.message}, #{sysLog.userId}, #{sysLog.userName}, #{sysLog.method}, #{sysLog.uri}, #{sysLog.ip}, #{sysLog.version}, #{sysLog.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, `module`, `type`, message, req_param, res_param, take_up_time, user_id, user_name, `method`, uri, ip, version, create_time FROM log_info WHERE id = #{logId}
SELECT id, req_param, `name`, message, user_id, user_name, `method`, uri, ip, version, create_time FROM log_error_info WHERE id=#{logErrorId}
